business.pricing: Initial consultation from $150; comprehensive reports quoted per project.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Providence provides professional antique appraisal services in the Providence area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Linda M.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Jessica W.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Heritage Valuations Providence's expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Patricia T.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Jennifer J.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Karen R.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

business.pricing: Initial consultation from $150; comprehensive reports quoted per project.

reviews.author: Nancy T.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Nancy B.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Jessica C.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Jennifer T.
reviews.content: Knowledgeable about antiques, though communication could have been better during the process.
